hanzi-su-wiki:
聴

Значения

Слышать, слушать

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Внимай лишь добродетели 徳. Остальное пропускай мимо ушей 耳.

Варианты

聽, 聼, 听
purpleculture_pinyin:
tīng
Japanese variant of 听
Японский вариант прослушивания
rtega_mnemonic:
聽聽RS
听听		聴hear, listen, understand, obey
  • ethical 𢛳 king 王 listening 耳 to and understanding his subjects who obey him
  • ⓢ orders 口 should be listened to, understood and be "protected" 斤: be obeyed
  • listening 耳 with ten 十 eyes 目 and your heart 心
  • ⓢ listen to and obey the one who speaks 口 with an ax 斤
heisig_constituent: listen, ear, stethoscope, camel, ten, needle, eye, cross-eyed, net, heart
heisig_story: Ear . . . needle . . . eye . . . heart. Compare frame 427 for this and the following kanji, and then once again when you get to frame 950.
koohiiStory1: I promise to use my ear to do nothing but listen ... stick a needle in my eye, cross my heart and hope to die! (Intentionally said backwards to get the order of the primitives correct).
koohiiStory2: Listening to others is different from hearing [1626] with the ear. One must allow the words to pierce through the eyes (the window of the soul) and reach deep into the heart...a symbol of thinking about and contemplating on what was said, not just the sounds of words spoken. A married man while reading his newspaper, his wife going on about something suddenly, says, "You´re not listening to me, are you?" He replies, "I heard every word you said. You said..." “Yes, but you´re not listening.".
jp_example_words:
聴覚(ちょうかく): the sense of hearing
聴講(ちょうこう): lecture attendance, auditing
聴診器(ちょうしんき): stethoscope
WaniKani_Radicals: 耳, 十, 罒, 心
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When your ear is crossed with sound, it catches it like a net, and sends it to your heart for processing. Because you're using your heart to process this sound, it means you're giving it a proper listen.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the whole process of sound going through your ear and to your heart, then the gears turning to really understand what someone is saying. It's a real listen, not a fake non-heart listen.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You are listening so well to what someone is saying. What are they telling you that is so important? They are telling you of the omen of Mrs. Chou (ちょう), who will destroy the earth.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Focus on listening, and focus on their message about Mrs. Chou. Feel afraid about the future because of it.
Ru_Notes:
Сравни きく:
聞く: общее слово, все смыслы: слушать человека, слушать музыку, слушать лекцию, выслушивать; спрашивать.
聴く: слушать внимательно, например, музыку или лекцию
訊く: спрашивать [и слушать ответ]
Ru_Words:
聴くきく
  • слышать, слушать, выслушивать
  • слышать, узнавать
  • спрашивать, осведомляться, узнавать
  • слушать[ся], следовать (совету), внимать (просьбе), соглашаться (с требованием)
    • warodai
    聴取ちょうしゅ
  • слушание
  • подслушивание, радиоперехват
    • 聴衆ちょうしゅう
  • слушатели, аудитория
Ru_Radicals: 十 (десять), 心 (сердце), 買 (покупать), 耳 (ухо)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the ten (十) nets (罒) of your heart (心) help your ear (耳) to listen

Name meaning

tīng
яп. вм. 听
Radicals: 耳, 十, 罒, 心  (ear, cross, net, heart)
Meaning Mnemonic
When your ear is crossed with sound, it catches it like a net, and sends it to your heart for processing. Because you're using your heart to process this sound, it means you're giving it a proper listen.
Imagine the whole process of sound going through your ear and to your heart, then the gears turning to really understand what someone is saying. It's a real listen, not a fake non-heart listen.
Reading Mnemonic
You are listening so well to what someone is saying. What are they telling you that is so important? They are telling you of the omen of Mrs. Chou (ちょう), who will destroy the earth.
Focus on listening, and focus on their message about Mrs. Chou. Feel afraid about the future because of it.
